title: China Spaceplane Lands After Record 276 Days In Orbit
summary: China’s secretive reusable spaceplane has completed its second mission, successfully landing on May 8th after spending 276 days in orbit.

title: The space industry needs COPUOS to rethink its approach to decision-making
summary: The United Nations Committee on the Peaceful Uses of Outer Space (COPUOS) can’t advance the governance necessary to meet the needs of today’s space sector. To fix the problem, COPUOS needs to rethink its approach to consensus decision-making.

title: Brightline First To Equip Trains With Starlink
summary: Brightline has announced that it has become the first in its industry to provide Starlink satellite broadband to its customers.

title: SpaceX hires former NASA human spaceflight official Kathy Lueders to help with Starship
summary: Kathy Lueders, the most recent top human spaceflight official at NASA, has joined Elon Musk’s SpaceX after retiring from the agency a couple of weeks ago, CNBC has learned.

title: A private company has an audacious plan to rescue NASA’s last “Great Observatory”
summary: "I think it would be pretty ambitious... but really great if we could pull it off."
